title: Ships at work
creator_credit: Christopher Cordeaux, Malcolm Otton and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
brief_description: A small boy finding himself on board a tugboat, learns about the different parts of the ship, and the various functions of other types of ships - dredges, tankers, cargo ships, and a hydrofoil. Explains different loading methods for wheat, wool, coal, oil, and cars. Tells where the goods are from and their destinations.
